title: Annapurna Base Camp
subtitle: Sanctuary of the giants
about: The trek to Annapurna Base Camp traverses through diverse terrain from terraced rice fields to the high-altitude Annapurna Sanctuary. It is an amphitheater of mountains where trekkers stand surrounded by some of the highest peaks on Earth.
seo_title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek — Himalayan Sanctuary
seo_description: Trek into the heart of the Annapurna Sanctuary, surrounded by towering 8000m peaks. A classic Himalayan tea-house trek.

trek_places.name: Machapuchare Base Camp
trek_places.short: The gateway to the inner sanctuary
trek_places.about: MBC offers a prelude to the main sanctuary with up-close views of the sacred 'Fishtail' peak. It’s a colder, starker landscape that builds anticipation for the final push.
what_to_do: Wake up early for alpenglow on Machapuchare
Enjoy hot soup in the teahouse dining hall

trek_places.name: Annapurna Base Camp
trek_places.about: Standing at ABC feels like being in the palm of the mountains' hands. You are surrounded by Annapurna I, South, and Hiunchuli—a humbling and majestic experience.
what_to_do: Watch the sunrise light up the Annapurna massif
Take panoramic photos of the 360-degree view
